text:
@narendramodi The situation is going to be very dangerous in India amid Covid-19 that we can't expect. Complete combine lockdown in red & orange zone is required now. Green Zone can get relaxation
Otherwise,we lose many innocent life. COMPLETE LOCKDOWN FOR 2 MONTHS ANYHOW.. ✌✌
